record.title: PERSONAL EXPLANATION
record.narrative:
PERSONAL EXPLANATION -- (House of Representatives - June 17, 2008)

[Page: H5459]

speaking.paragraph: Madam Speaker, on June 17, 2008, I regret that I was not present to vote on H.R. 2964, H.R. 3702, and H.R. 1275 due to a personal business conflict.
Had I been present, I would have voted "yea" on all votes.
